page.title: 06A RESIDENT'S ROUTINE,PART 2
page.content: { {13:00 Mrs Wray puts her apron in the { kitchen at Cundall Manor Prep { School and washes up the tins { from school dinners. {14:30 She helps the cooks in their { preparations for the boarding { boys'tea. {15:30 She goes across the road to { to clean and tidy the pre- { preparatory school. {16:30 She goes home in the minibus. {17:00 She has a cup of coffee and { makes tea for Sarah and Mr Wray. {18:00 She reads a book until 21:00 { unless the shops are open in { which case she does the family { shopping. {21:00 She watches the 'Nine o'clock { News'. {21:30 After a final cup of coffee,Mrs { Wray goes to bed.
